basic.Peptide Name: Polybia-CP (Polybia chemotactic peptide; Venom protein CP; Insects, animals)
basic.Source: Polybia paulista (Neotropical social wasp) (Swarm-founding polistine wasp)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis CCT 2576 (MIC=15 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538 (MIC=15 µg/ml).
